mapper.select: SELECT id, password, sessionId, role FROM user WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET sessionId=#{sessionId} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, username, password, role, sessionId, sex, zonghang, fenhang, zhihang, fenlichu, mobile) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{role}, #{sessionId}, #{sex}, #{zonghang}, #{fenhang}, #{zhihang}, #{fenlichu}, #{mobile})
